property.name: typename
property.shortdesc: The class name of the object.

property.name: sourceArt
property.shortdesc: The source art used when creating a new tracing object.

property.name: tracingOptions
property.shortdesc: The options used when tracing the artwork.

property.name: pathCount
property.shortdesc: The number of paths in the tracing result.

property.name: anchorCount
property.shortdesc: The number of anchors in the tracing result.

property.name: usedColorCount
property.shortdesc: The number of colors used in the tracing result.

method.name: releaseTracing
method.shortdesc: Release the source artwork for the tracing object. Deletes this tracing object.

method.name: expandTracing
method.shortdesc: Expand the tracing to paths. Deletes this tracing object.

parameters.name: viewed
parameters.shortdesc: Expand as viewed with the raster and vector view modes.
